arguments.name: Connection
arguments.description: A text string of the name of the connection to the cube.

arguments.name: Set_expression
arguments.description: A text string of a set expression that results in a set of members or tuples. Set_expression can also be a cell reference to an Excel range that contains one or more members, tuples, or sets included in the set.

arguments.name: Caption
arguments.description: A text string that is displayed in the cell instead of the caption, if one is defined, from the cube.

arguments.name: Sort_order
arguments.description: The type of sort, if any, to perform and can be one of the following:
